about_the_game:
Welcome to "The Silent Bells" a chilling horror game that delves into the darkest corners of internet folklore. Set in the nostalgic era of VHS tapes, this anthology presents four bone-chilling stories inspired by infamous internet creepypastas. Players will embark on a harrowing journey through eerie environments, unraveling sinister mysteries and confronting terrifying entities lurking within the analog static.

As you step into the shoes of various protagonists, each story unfolds with its own unique atmosphere and dread-inducing narrative.

Throughout each story, the VHS aesthetic immerses players in a world of analog nostalgia, complete with distorted visuals, grainy filters, and authentic audio artifacts. With a blend of psychological terror and pulse-pounding suspense, "The Silent Bells" delivers an unforgettable horror experience that will leave players questioning what lurks beyond the static. Do you hear the bells chime?

content_descriptors.notes: During gameplay players will come across and use weapons such as hunting rifles and will have to use such weapons against human-like monsters. Players may also come across dried blood on buildings and objects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core with Hyper-Threading
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX 480
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek ALC255-CG
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek ALC255-CG

short_description: Dive into the eerie realms of "The Silent Bells" a spine-chilling horror anthology video game. Unearth four haunting stories, each woven from the threads of internet horror and creepypastas. Brace yourself, for every silent bell tolls the arrival of a new nightmare.
